title: 2022 Orbea Orca Aero spins up faster, lighter, more integrated aero road bike
content:
Orbea’s new Orca Aero is exactly what you would expect from a modern carbon aero road bike these days – faster and lighter than ever, and fully integrated from tip to tail. But beyond deep tube shapes and full internal cable routing, the new Orca Aero also builds in some nice new features like a

The post 2022 Orbea Orca Aero spins up faster, lighter, more integrated aero road bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
